v8:item.v8:content: Automatic search of update in Internet (recommended) Update from the user support site of 1C:Enterprise 8
Local or network directory Updating from the delivery file in a local or network directory

Failed to connect to the Internet to get the information on update. Possible reasons: • There is no connection to the Internet; • Website is malfunctioning; • The firewall or other middleware (antiviruses, etc.) block the attempts of the application to connect to Internet; • Connection to Internet is established through troxy server, but its parameters are not configured in the application.
See technical details in the event log.
For receiving application update from the user site enter user code and password
How to get the user ID and password?

Failed to connect to the user site with specified user ID and password. Please, make sure that: • the subscription to the Information and Technological Support (ITS) is valid • user ID and password are correct
Failed to connect to the user site with specified user ID and password. Please make sure that the user code and a password have been specified correctly.

Application version update can also be received within the information and technological maintenance (<link ITM>1C:ITM</>) including access to technological, methodical and consulting materials (on DVD or in the Internet), and also service and consulting services.
See technical details in the event log.
The update file is not required as it has already been loaded to the main configuration
Main configuration doesn't differ from information database configuration. It is recommended to update from the main configuration.
Update is not required, as database configuration doesn't differ from the main configuration
The new application version is available
For continuation it is necessary to examine with information about <link UpdateOrder>by update order</>.

For updating on this version the 1C:Enterprise platform not lower than the <b>8 version is required.3.5.1068</>. It is necessary <link UpdatePlatform> go to on new platform version</>, then it will be possible to establish this update.
Update is not found for this application version.
Option to make changes is enabled
The configuration with the enabled option to make changes in metadata can not be updated automatically. Use the standard Designer tools (menu "Configuration" - "Support" - "Update configuration").
Application update is performed at the data synchronization with "%1".
It may take from several seconds to several hours to update the application depending on the update size, Internet connection speed and the computer performance.
Obtaining update files is running: 1 from 1...
For continuation it is necessary to examine with <link UpdateOrder>by update order</>.
Install the update right now (you will have to restart)
Process of updating can take a long time. Do not power off the computer till the process completion.

Update from the Internet application is received. Application restart will be required for installation. Process of updating can take a long time. Do not power off the computer until the installation process is completed.
Other users are working with the application. To continue it is necessary to terminate their sessions.
External applications are working with the application. To continue it is necessary to terminate their sessions.
Designer is opened. Exit the Designer to continue.
Create temporary IB backup copy and roll back in case of emergency.
For continuation it is necessary to examine with <link UpdateOrder>by update order</>.
Install the update right now (you will have to restart)
Schedule the update installation for the specified time
The update will be installed from this computer in the backgroung mode. Computer must be powered on at the time and date specified.
Process of updating can take a long time. Do not power off the computer till the process completion.
Other users are working with the application. Their work will be completed automatically.
Other users and external applications are working with infobase. Their work will be completed automatically.
Prior to installation of the update it is recommended to back up the infobase.
Installation of the new application version is successfully completed. Click Done to finish the update.
During application update there were errors. Errors data have been saved to the event log.
The date and time of update have been set
Recovery of results of the previous start
Update is available for next version
